Text:
A bit of overkill there, eh? Calibre profiles for different devices are virtually the same, especially for devices of nearly the same screen size. And if you don't have many images, I doubt anyone would notice any difference at all regardless of device. You could save yourself some trouble if you just offered the book in 4 or 5 file formats (epub, mobi, pdf, fb2, doc) and leave it at that.

But thanks for the book, I'll give it a try.
